articles.author: http://www.abc.net.au/news/andie-noonan/6559670
articles.title: Victoria Police have faked more than 250,000 roadside breath tests
articles.description: Victoria Police officers have falsified more than 250,000 roadside breath tests in the state over a five year period, an internal investigation reveals.

articles.author: http://www.abc.net.au/news/dan-conifer/5189074
articles.title: Scouts, Salvos, YMCA, Anglican Church sign on to abuse redress scheme
articles.description: Scouts Australia, the Salvation Army, YMCA Australia and the Anglican Church are all joining the national redress scheme for child abuse survivors.

articles.title: 'Murdered' Russian journalist Arkady Babchenko appears at news conference
articles.description: A Russian journalist supposedly shot dead in Ukraine says his death had been faked in an elaborate plot to catch Russian agents trying to kill him.

articles.author: http://www.abc.net.au/news/joanna-menagh/4421090, http://www.abc.net.au/news/briana-shepherd/6843240
articles.title: The horrors of the Warminda hostel and the children who were never heard. Until now
articles.description: Martin Cooper was supposed to care for vulnerable children, but instead subjected them to horrendous and repeated physical and sexual abuse. Now 40 years on, justice has finally been served.

articles.author: http://www.abc.net.au/news/louise--yaxley/5553226
articles.title: Greg Hunt says he's sorry for swearing at the Mayor of Katherine
articles.description: Health Minister Greg Hunt has apologised for swearing at a mayor and for taking six months to say sorry.

articles.author: http://www.abc.net.au/news/riley-stuart/8151366
articles.title: How not to valet park a Porsche
articles.description: They say a picture tells 1,000 words, but this snap from Sydney's Hyatt Regency hotel — where a Porsche ended up under an SUV — will leave you speechless.

articles.author: http://www.abc.net.au/news/catherine-hanrahan/7901852
articles.title: Chart of the day: We're spending less on entertainment — with one big exception
articles.description: Australians are spending less on televisions and books, but more on holidays and sports lessons.

articles.title: Key suspect in SA serial murders named
articles.description: Mildura man Steven Hainsworth is identified as the key suspect in the serial murders of two grandmothers and a pensioner.

articles.author: http://www.abc.net.au/news/abc-local/luke-wong/7037150
articles.title: Egyptian antiquities uncovered during Sydney house clean-up
articles.description: A large collection of Egyptian antiquities uncovered during a clean-up of a Sydney home is donated to a university archaeological museum.

articles.title: Construction site in Sydney CBD goes up in flames
articles.description: A fire has ripped through a construction site in the heart of Sydney's CBD, with traffic diversions in place as commuters head to work.
